channel.title: Project czar problem compiling
channel.description:
Basically, my server is based on the 'project czar' source. But im having problems compiling it. I've tried several compilers, and modified them to suite my server and they still don't work. :( Some one please help!!!
My current compiler is scripted like this:
[code]@echo off title Thinkscapev2 compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\java.exe" server pause[/code]
And when I compile it, it says:
[URL=http://img209.imageshack.us/my.php?image=thingysb3sy0.jpg][IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/2473/thingysb3sy0.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
SOMEONE PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!!!!!! :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Project czar problem compiling
item.dc:creator: @Killer-99-pkz Killer-99-pkz
item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

no… do this creat 2 folder name one Java And the other Classes put ONLY java files in the java folder and watever else there is put in the classes folder then use this for run -->

@echo off
TITLE Runserver.bat
color 04
cd Classes
java server
exit

And this for compiling

@echo off
TITLE Compling Server
color 04
echo Compiling Server…
“c:\program files\java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin\javac.exe” -cp ./Java;./Classes -d ./Classes ./Java/*.java
TITLE Done compiling
pause

There You go. Much more organized.

Read full topic

item.title: Project czar problem compiling
item.dc:creator: @nubsta nubsta
item.description:
@nubsta wrote:

[quote=“r 4 v 1, post:2, topic:195411”]Pure pk719, Please add this to your compiler, first right click on your compiler and click Edit, and then add this

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

ok :)?

                                                                                Thanks, R 4 V 1 ;)[/quote]

Dude its nothing to do with the compiler, pure just messed up when he added something

Read full topic

@r_4_v_1 wrote:

Pure pk719, Please add this to your compiler, first right click on your compiler and click Edit, and then add this

“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

ok :)?
